citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
During inspection, the licensee did not have access to multiple records including the written program of veterinary care
and the contingency plan to allow the inspector to review. Review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act facilitates
the inspection process by allowing inspectors to determine compliance of documents and evaluate animal welfare. Each
exhibitor shall during inspection, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the
regulations in this part.
Correct from this date forward of 24 October 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
During inspection, the licensee did not have access to multiple records including the written program of veterinary care 
and the contingency plan to allow the inspector to review. Review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act facilitates 
the inspection process by allowing inspectors to determine compliance of documents and evaluate animal welfare. Each 
exhibitor shall during inspection, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the 
regulations in this part.  
 
Correct from this date forward of 24 October 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
